name: Stygian Revery Pre-Alpha Build
description:
Stygian Revery is a first person shooter set in a dieselpunk universe where technology and magic combine in a grotesque future where mankind has to fight cosmic horrors and abominations in order to survive.

This is a pre-alpha build of the game, featuring 1 horde mode level, 4 enemies and 4 weapons.
